name: Sunrise Atelier, Inc.
description: Provider of a free calender application for mobile devices. The company has developed a mobile application that is made for Google Calendar users, providing real-time synchronization, quick-add event tools, time-zone support and Facebook events and birthdays.
one_liner: Provider of a free calender application for mobile devices. The company has developed a mobile application that is made for Google Calendar users, providing real-time synchronization, quick-add event tools, time-zone support and Facebook events and birthdays.
